entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
